text: Holon Toto Hall is an indoor arena that is located in Holon, Israel. The arena is mainly used to host basketball games. It has a seating capacity of 5,400.5,400 מקומות . ==History== Holon Toto Hall was opened in March 2015. In 2016, the arena hosted the Rhythmic Gymnastics European Championships. The arena has been used as the home arena of the Israeli Basketball Super League club Hapoel Holon. ==Gallery== {|class="collapsible" style="border:1px solid #ddd; float:center; margin:5px 5px 0 0;" |- !style="background:#f5f5f5; padding:5px;"|Holon Toto Hall Image Gallery |- | |} ==References== ==External links== *Holon Arena at GAB Architects Category:Basketball venues in Israel Category:Indoor arenas in Israel Category:Sport in Holon Category:Sports venues in Tel Aviv District
title: Holon Toto Hall
